One reservation about a presidential bid that Mr. Mike Pence has expressed in private meetings is whether he can raise the money to compete with the well-funded Mitt Romney . But Mr. Benko said that shouldn't be a hindrance. If Mike Pence runs, the money will follow in a big way, he said.
